name: Collect Iron Ore
description: Mine Iron Ore using the solid drill. To configure the drill, use the middle mouse button.

name: Collect Iron Ingot
description: Use the iron ore to make iron ingots using the smelter. Belts can be drawn around machines with left mouse button

name: Collect Mezholium
description: Mezholium is a local type of rock. You can get it from liquid drills.
